trans-unit.source: Usage of Calculation Views per User

seg-source.mrk: Usage of Calculation Views per User

trans-unit.source: When using a calculation schedule on creating a calculation, the values of the Calculation View Authorization field are transferred from the Calculation Schedule line to the Calculation line.

seg-source.mrk: When using a calculation schedule on creating a calculation, the values of the Calculation View Authorization field are transferred from the Calculation Schedule line to the Calculation line.

trans-unit.source: The calculation lines with calculation view authorization levels higher than the level assigned in the user setup are suppressed.

seg-source.mrk: The calculation lines with calculation view authorization levels higher than the level assigned in the user setup are suppressed.

trans-unit.source: : Calculation line view for Level 1 users

seg-source.mrk: : Calculation line view for Level 1 users

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref286302061" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref> illustrates the Calculation Card view for users that are set up with the calculation view authorization Level 1 entered in ascending order in the Calculation Schedule Card lines.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref286302061" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref> illustrates the Calculation Card view for users that are set up with the calculation view authorization Level 1 entered in ascending order in the Calculation Schedule Card lines.
